title: Trying to Reconnect
body:
We're attepting to automaticlly Reconnect you to League Of Legends. If your Internet connection is otherwise ok, check our support page for possible solutions.

Was muss ich tuen ?

Bitte um Rückantwort 

LG WorstZedEUW

replies.body:
Hallo,
[hier ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de/articles/201752664-Fehlerbehebung-bei-Verbindungsproblemen)ist geschildert was du bei Verbindungsproblemen tun kannst.
